description: the CT114 for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5-2-7-2.
full_summary:
# Federal Government Tender Announcement
## Department of National Defence - Aviation Replacement Parts

**Tender Details**

*   Solicitation Number: W8485-237157/C
*   Supply Arrangement Series: W8485-184741
*   Reference Number: PW-22-01014857
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Publication Date: 2022-11-25
*   Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-08T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2022-11-29

**Notice Type and Procurement Method**

*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Service Category**

*   GSIN: N1670
*   Description: Parachutes, Aerial Pick-Up Delivery, Recovery Systems, and Cargo Tie Down Equipment

**End User and Contracting Entity**

*   End User Entity: Department of National Defence
*   Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**

*   Contact Name: Ryan Duncan
*   Contact Email: ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca
*   Contact Phone: Not Provided

The Department of National Defence invites qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit proposals for the supply of aviation replacement parts for the Canadian Armed Forces. The procurement is restricted to SA Holders of the W8485-184741 series, who have been invited to participate in the request for proposal (RFP) process.

Applicants should submit their proposals electronically through email to the Contracting Authority, Ryan Duncan, who will distribute the RFP documents directly. Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the documents.

---

## Opportunities for Qualification
Opportunities for qualification under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at least once a year. Suppliers may submit their requests to become qualified for the supply arrangement to Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader at Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector, by email at [samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). - [Changes made to rewriting the entry are noted above
